docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court is giving an election-year hearing to a dispute over state regulation of abortion clinics in the court's first abortion case in eight years.

docs.lead_paragraph: Medicare spending on breakthrough medications for hepatitis C will nearly double this year, passing $9 billion, according to new government figures. That's raising insurance costs for all beneficiaries, whether or not they have the liver-wasting viral disease.

headline.main: APNewsBreak: Medicare Spending $9B on Hepatitis C Drugs

docs.lead_paragraph: Conflicting rulings about whether women should have to cross state lines to obtain an abortion could prompt the Supreme Court to take up its first case on the hot-button social issue since 2007.

headline.main: 3 Things to Know About the Sprint Blood Pressure Trial

docs.abstract: New data from a major study called Sprint has shaken some of the basic assumptions about the treatment of high blood pressure.
